attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently, the killer of 5 ipswitch prostitutes was sentenced. But although prostitution is wrong, how do you deal with a mass murderer? Also, Sally Anne Bowman's killer has been jailed. But is prison enough? If they were dead, they couldn't murder again...

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/DeathPenalty2007/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
